title: Prayer times: Qibla & Azan
description:
Perform Salah wherever you are!
Prayer Times is an Android application for Muslims all around the world. Simple to use, it provides Islamic namaz timetable and the direction of the Qibla. Schedules are calculated based on your location and local convention.
Here are some of the features offered by the application.
PRAYER TIMES:
Get the Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib and Isha times for your city.
Display time with 12 or 24 hour format.
EASY SEARCH:
Manually search for your city (for example, by entering "London", UK) or be automatically located with your GPS and Internet connection.
MULTI-LOCATION:
Add as many locations as you need for your regular trips.
MANUAL ADJUSTMENTS:
Adjust the minutes for each Salat time.
Set the prayer calculation method (Muslim World League, Egyptian General Authority of Survey, etc.), the twilight angle (for the Fajr and Isha), the juristic school (for the Asr) and the angle based method.
AZAN & NOTIFICATIONS:
Receive notifications to not miss any Salat.
Select from a list of adhans (recited by different muezzins) or tones.
FAJR ALARM:
Wake up every day before Fajr prayer.
QIBLA DIRECTION:
Find the Kaaba direction accurately using the compass and the map.
ISLAMIC CALENDAR:
Get the Islamic calendar.
Adjust the Hijri date according to your country.
IMPORTANT NOTES:
(1) In order to find your city: make sure that your location permission, your internet connection and your GPS are enabled.
(2) If the prayer times seem different from those of your mosque: check your settings.
(3) Some permissions are required for proper operation of the application.
(4) For any questions, suggestions or bug reports: a tutorial, an F.A.Q and a contact form are available in the application.
FIND US ON:
https://www.facebook.com/muslimtoolbox
https://twitter.com/muslimtoolbox
https://www.pinterest.com/muslimtoolbox/
https://www.instagram.com/muslimtoolbox/
https://www.youtube.com/muslimtoolbox
Thank you in advance for your comments.
May Allah (swt) preserve us and guide us all to the right path.

Perform Salah wherever you are!
Prayer Times is an Android application for Muslims all around the world. Simple to use, it provides Islamic namaz timetable and the direction of the Qibla. Schedules are calculated based on your location and local convention.

Here are some of the features offered by the application.

PRAYER TIMES:
Get the Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib and Isha times for your city.
Display time with 12 or 24 hour format.

EASY SEARCH:
Manually search for your city (for example, by entering "London", UK) or be automatically located with your GPS and Internet connection.

MULTI-LOCATION:
Add as many locations as you need for your regular trips.

MANUAL ADJUSTMENTS:
Adjust the minutes for each Salat time.
Set the prayer calculation method (Muslim World League, Egyptian General Authority of Survey, etc.), the twilight angle (for the Fajr and Isha), the juristic school (for the Asr) and the angle based method.

AZAN & NOTIFICATIONS:
Receive notifications to not miss any Salat.
Select from a list of adhans (recited by different muezzins) or tones.

ISLAMIC CALENDAR:

Adjust the Hijri date according to your country.
